Devices and features which are supported in amazon-freertos 202002.00-rx-1.0.5

RX MCU and Board 						Compiler 								Endianness 							Import project for MQTT						Import project for OTA								Project creation for MQTT								Project creation for OTA			|
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------	|
RX65N-RSK								CCRX									Little								Yes											Yes													Yes														No									|
RX65N-RSK								CCRX									Big									Yes											No													Yes														No									|
RX65N-RSK								GCC										Little								Yes											Yes													Yes														No									|
RX65N-RSK								GCC										Big									No											No													No														No									|
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------	|

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------	|

RX65N-Cloud Kit							GCC										Little								Yes											Yes													Yes														No									|
RX65N-Cloud Kit							GCC										Big									No											No													No														No									|
